      • makeJson

        public static boolean makeJson​(int remainingTime,
                               Player player,
                               java.util.Set<AbstractActor> enemies,
                               java.lang.String jsonName,
                               AbstractTile[][] tiles)
        A method that takes a multitude of parameters, and uses them to create a save file for a given level.
        Parameters:
        remainingTime - - The remaining time in the given level.
        player - - The player as they currently are in the given level.
        enemies - - The enemies as they currently are in the given level.
        jsonName - - The name of the JSON file to use.
        tiles - - The tiles as they are currently in the given level.
        Returns:
        boolean - whether or not the JSON file was successfully made.
